sentences.en: As for those agitators , I wish they would go the whole way and emasculate themselves!
sentences.cn: 12恨不得那搅乱你们的人,把自己割绝了.

sentences.en: Physically, she was of a pale, emasculate and unimportant structure.
sentences.cn: 就身体上说, 她肤色苍白, 身体柔弱,并不出色.

sentences.en: The bill has been emasculated by Congress.
sentences.cn: 国会削弱了这个法案的效力。

sentences.en: The company tried to emasculate the unions.
sentences.cn: 公司试图削弱工会的力量。

sentences.en: To deprive of virility or spirit; emasculate.
sentences.cn: 使丧失精力或精神; 使软弱.

words.tran_cn: 柔弱的；被阉割的；去势的
阉割；使柔弱（emasculate的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 阉割, 使柔弱, 删削, 使无力
trans.tran_en: to make someone or something weaker or less effective

trans.tran_cn: 阉割，使柔弱，删削，使无力
